verse: एको हि रुद्रो न द्वितीयाय तस्थुर्य इमांल्लोकानीशत ईशनीभिः। प्रत्यङ्जनांस्तिष्ठति सञ्चुकोचान्तकाले संसृज्य विश्वा भुवनानि गोपाः॥

terms.सञ्चुकोचान्तकाले: withdraws at the end of creation

meaning: Indeed, there is only one Rudra, not a second. He, with sovereignity, abides in every atom. He withdraws at the end of creation, creating the entire worlds. The protectors.
